Tanks

类 Projectiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Projectiles

  • public class Projectiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Class related to explosives, used for tank explosions and ammunition

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Projectiles

        public Projectiles(float x,
                   float y,
                   float degree,
                   float initialVelocity,
                   float size,
                   char owner,
                   int startTime)
        Constructor
        参数:
        x - Starting x coordinate
        y - Starting y coordinate
        degree - Launch angle of the shell; 0 when exploding
        initialVelocity - Initial velocity when fired; 0 when exploding
        size - Degree of explosion
        owner - The person who caused this explosion or fired the shell
        startTime - Time when this event occurs
